q: R-Ind., who is a favorite of fiscal and social conservatives but rejected appeals that he run for president, turned down an invitation to speak at CPAC, where he has appeared six times. At this time, the congressman is focusing his attention on Indiana, Mike Pence spokesman Matt Lloyd said.`` He hopes to participate in future CPAC opportunities as his schedule permits.'' Steve Ballmer , Microsoft chief executive.`` Cloud computing, and specifically Windows Azure, enables banks to move from a capital intensive cost model to one which is based on the consumption of technology,'' says Steve Ballmer . No longer will banks need to over-order computing resources because the scale of the Azure platform allows high volume workloads such as end-of-day processing to be consumed on demand. Reflecting its strategic importance, the debate over the use of cloud computing in financial services has moved up the agenda at this year's Sibos and has already been the subject of lively early Monday discussion with

QB) Michael Vick . But this morning, on The Ticket( 1310 AM), he stuck to his story that he gave Michael Vick a key to the city`` for the children.'' Don't you believe it's possible that by honoring this felon you sent the wrong message to the kids?... Now the kids say` This guy killed dogs he went to jail he's on probation and he's getting honored with a key to the city that is supposed to be presented to someone like a war hero,' one of the hosts said.`` The kids don't say that,'' Dwaine Caraway said. In his comprehensive History of Tennis, Bud Collins describes Fred Perry as jaunty, a bit cocky in his breezy self-assurance, with gallery appeal. He could be sarcastic and some thought him egotistic, but it was a pose and he had an ever-ready grin. He cut a handsome figure with his regular features, raven black hair, and physique that was perfection for the game. Once he developed the stroke that had eluded him( a running forehand, attacking the ball on the rise), he was virtually unstoppable. He is supporting the troops, I am supporting the children, he said. Dwaine Caraway gave Michael Vick the key during an event at Club Cirque that was attended by children who came to hear Michael Vick 's story. Dwaine Caraway said he would do it all over again
